Reference

Creating Hillshades and Overlays

Functions for generating hillshades and overlays

ambient_shade()

Calculate Ambient Occlusion Map

height_shade()

Calculate Terrain Color Map

lamb_shade()

Calculate Lambert Shading Map

ray_shade()

Calculate Raytraced Shadow Map

sphere_shade()

Calculate Surface Color Map

create_texture()

Create Texture

generate_altitude_overlay()

Generate Altitude Overlay

generate_contour_overlay()

Generate Contour Overlay

generate_line_overlay()

Generate Line Overlay

generate_polygon_overlay()

Generate Polygon Overlay

detect_water()

Detect water

Adding Shadows and Overlays to Maps

Functions adding layers to maps.

add_overlay()

Add Overlay

add_shadow()

Add Shadow

add_water()

Add Water

Plotting and Saving 2D and 3D Visualizations

Functions for displaying/saving 2D visualizations and 3D prints

plot_3d()

Plot 3D

plot_gg()

Transform ggplot2 objects into 3D

plot_map()

Plot Map

save_3dprint()

Save 3D Print

save_obj()

Save OBJ

save_png()

Save PNG

Render Path

Render Points

render_polygons()

Render Polygons

render_scalebar()

Render Scale Bar

render_snapshot()

render_water()

Helper functions for manipulating rasters

Helper functions to manipulate and simplify rasters.

calculate_normal()

Calculate Normal

raster_to_matrix()

Raster to Matrix

resize_matrix()

Resize Matrix

Included Data

Elevation data included with rayshader

montereybay

Monterey Bay combined topographic and bathymetric elevation matrix.

monterey_counties_sf

California County Data Around Monterey Bay

monterey_roads_sf

Road Data Around Monterey Bay
